item.description:
Members Steve and Susan Boshi will tell us about their recent five-week adventure traveling through France, fulfilling their dream of a lifetime after months of enthusiastic planning. “Everywhere they went” they report finding traces and influences of the French Enlightenment, “the cradle of modern Humanism.” Beginning with ten unforgettable days in and around Paris, they went next to Normandy, where they rented a car and then drove to a carefully researched list of destinations along a path that included the Loire River valley, Burgundy, Haute-Savoie, and Provence, ending on the Riviera. They’ll share with us their vivid impressions of experiences all along the way, punctuated by a choice selection of a few favorite photographs among the thousands they brought back.

We'll start with thirty minutes of coffee and conversation at 7:30 p.m. The talk will follow brief announcements at 8:00 PM.
item.how_to_find_us: We will most probably be in the Social Hall near the main entrance.
item.name: Monthly Meeting: Our Pilgrimage To La Belle France
